con:configuration.content: A project with that name already exists.

con:assertion.name: Verify the displayed error of projectKey is correct

con:testCase.name: APITT_009 - User is not able to create a project with invalid projectTypeKey

con:testStep.name: Create project with invalid project key

con:restRequest.name: Create project with invalid project key
con:restRequest.con:request: { "key": "DORANEW", "name": "Doraemon valid name", "projectTypeKey": "nobita", "projectTemplateKey": "com.atlassian.jira-core-project-templates:jira-core-project-management", "description": "Project Sample Type is Nobita", "lead": "admin", "url": "http://atlassian.com", "assigneeType": "PROJECT_LEAD", "avatarId": 10200, "permissionScheme": 10000 }

con:configuration.content: An invalid project type was specified. Make sure the project type is available in your Jira instance. Please talk to your Jira administrator if you need more help.

con:testCase.name: APITT_010 - User is not able to create a project with invalid lead

con:restRequest.name: Create project with invalid lead
con:restRequest.con:request: { "key": "DORANEW", "name": "Doraemon valid name", "projectTypeKey": "business", "projectTemplateKey": "com.atlassian.jira-core-project-templates:jira-core-project-management", "description": "Project Sample Type is Business", "lead": "invalidLead", "url": "http://atlassian.com", "assigneeType": "PROJECT_LEAD", "avatarId": 10200, "permissionScheme": 10000 }

con:configuration.content: You must specify a valid project lead.

con:testCase.name: APITT_011 - Add Comment On Valid Owner Ticket
APITT_012 - Add Comment On Invalid Ticket

con:configuration.content: Issue does not exist or you do not have permission to see it.

con:testCase.name: APITT_013 - Try Adding Empty Comment

con:configuration.content: Comment body can not be empty!

con:testCase.name: APITT_014 - Add Comment On Valid Non-Owner Ticket
APITT_015 - Add Comment With Special Characters
APITT_016 - Update With Valid Comment
APITT_017 - Update With Emply Comment

con:configuration.content: Comment body can not be empty!

con:testCase.name: APITT_018 - Update Comment Twice

con:property.con:name: updated_comment
con:property.con:value: Doreamon update this comment first time

con:testCase.name: APITT_019 - Update Comment With Invalid Comment ID

con:configuration.content: Can not find a comment for the id: Invalid.

con:testCase.name: APITT_020 - Update Comment In Non-Owner Ticket

con:property.con:name: comment_text
con:property.con:value: Zixuka va Nobita la doi ban than

con:testCase.name: APITT_021 - Search With Issue Type
APITT_022 - Search With Wrong Field

con:configuration.content: Field 'reporterer' does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

con:testCase.name: APITT_023 - Search With Wrong Syntax

con:configuration.content: Error in the JQL Query: Expecting operator but got 'AP'. The valid operators are '=', '!=', '<', '>', '<=', '>=', '~', '!~', 'IN', 'NOT IN', 'IS' and 'IS NOT'. (line 1, character 9)

con:testCase.name: APITT_024 - Search With Assignee
APITT_025 - Search With Multi-Field

con:property.con:name: jql
con:property.con:value: project = AP AND issuetype = Task AND status = \"To Do\" AND assignee in (hdkani) AND reporter in (hdkani)
